wood.lore: Wood remembers the forest. Buildings of wood feel alive.

stone.lore: Stone endures. Runes carved in stone last longest.

ice.lore: Ice preserves and slows. Time moves differently in frozen halls.

metal.lore: Metal channels power. Allomancers feel its pull.

marble.lore: Marble speaks of grandeur. Gods favor temples of white stone.

granite.lore: Granite resists all change. Runes carved here are nearly eternal.

clay.lore: Clay holds the potential for life. Breath mages value it.

bamboo.lore: Bamboo bends but does not break. Spirits rest in bamboo forests.

gold.lore: Gold never tarnishes. Divine beings favor its incorruptible nature.

silver.lore: Silver is the moon's metal. It wards against darkness and corruption.

copper.lore: Copper clouds Allomantic pulses. Smokers prize pure copper.

bronze.lore: Bronze detects Allomantic pulses. Seekers can sense magic through bronze.

specialEffects.description: Cold iron repels fae and spirits

iron.lore: Iron is anathema to the fae. It grounds magic and repels spirits.

steel.lore: Steel pushes. Coinshots hurl steel through the air.

mithril.description: Silvery elven metal, light as air
mithril.lore: Mithril is stronger than steel yet light as silk. Magic flows through it like water.

adamantine.lore: Adamantine cannot be broken. Reality itself yields before it does.

orichalcum.description: Legendary golden-red metal that glows faintly
orichalcum.lore: The metal of Atlantis. Orichalcum amplifies all magic tenfold.

diamond.lore: Diamonds focus magic to a razor point. Precision spells benefit most.

ruby.lore: Rubies burn with inner fire. They amplify emotions and blood magic.

sapphire.lore: Sapphires bring clarity and wisdom. Scholars prize them for focused study.

specialEffects.description: Nature spirits are drawn to emeralds

emerald.lore: Emeralds hold the essence of life. Healers and nature mages treasure them.

amethyst.lore: Amethyst opens the dreaming eye. Prophets sleep upon amethyst pillows.

topaz.lore: Topaz attracts fortune and success. Merchants keep topaz in their coffers.

opal.lore: Opal is chaos crystallized. Its magic is powerful but unpredictable.

pearl.lore: Pearls form from irritation transformed to beauty. They teach patience.

jade.lore: Jade bridges the living and the dead. Ancestors speak through jade carvings.

obsidian.lore: Obsidian reflects truth. Blood mages carve their blades from it.

crystal.lore: Crystal focuses and amplifies magic. Mana pools around crystal formations.

quartz.lore: Quartz remembers. Sympathy mages use quartz to store connections.

flesh.lore: Buildings of flesh are abominations—or miracles, depending on perspective.

bone.lore: Bone holds echoes of life. Necromancers build temples of bone.

chitin.lore: Chitin is the armor of the hive. Insectoid minds feel at home.

web.lore: Webs catch more than flies. Promises made in web-draped halls bind tighter.

wax.lore: Bees build in wax. Their collective consciousness leaves traces.

fungus.lore: Fungi connect everything underground. The mycelium network carries whispers.

living_wood.lore: Living wood breathes. Elven buildings of living wood are one with the forest.

amber.lore: Amber traps moments in time. Memories stored in amber never fade.

ivory.lore: Ivory carries the wisdom of great beasts. Their spirits may linger.

feather.lore: Feathers remember flight. Buildings of feather feel light as dreams.

scale.lore: Dragon scales are nearly indestructible and hold traces of draconic power.

candy.lore: Candy buildings exist where belief is strong. Children's dreams make them real.

chocolate.lore: Chocolate is love made solid. Buildings of chocolate radiate warmth.

gingerbread.lore: Gingerbread houses are built by witches—or grandmothers. Sometimes both.

cake.lore: Cake buildings collapse unless maintained by constant belief—or magic.

ice_cream.lore: Ice cream buildings exist in the dreams of summer. They melt in harsh reality.

cheese.lore: Mouse dreamers build castles of cheese. Some are quite elaborate.

bread.lore: Bread is sacred in many faiths. Bread buildings are blessed spaces.

sugar.lore: Sugar crystals refract light into rainbows. Pure sweetness made solid.

honey.lore: Honey is the labor of thousands. It holds community and preservation.

salt.lore: Salt is the universal ward. No evil spirit willingly crosses a salt line.

void.lore: Void is not emptiness—it is the absence of existence itself.

light.lore: Light made solid is a miracle. Only the most devoted can shape it.

darkness.lore: Darkness given form hides all within. What lurks inside is unknown.

dreams.lore: Dream-stuff is the raw material of imagination. It can become anything.

nightmares.lore: Nightmare buildings exist at the edge of madness. Fear made architecture.

time.lore: Time itself, crystallized. Within, past and future blur together.

memory.lore: Memory made solid. Walk through and experience the past.

emotion.lore: Raw emotion given form. The building itself feels.

thought.lore: Pure thought made real. Within, the mind races with clarity.

music.lore: Music frozen in the moment of perfection. The building hums eternally.

silence.lore: Silence is the canvas on which name magic is painted.

pages.lore: Buildings of pages contain all the knowledge written on them.

ink.lore: Ink carries intention. Words written in ink have power.

starlight.lore: Starlight falls from infinity. It carries the weight of distances.

moonlight.lore: Moonlight is the sun's reflection. It sees what daylight cannot.

sunlight.lore: Sunlight is truth. Nothing hides in buildings of solid sun.

shadow.lore: Shadows are the absence of light—yet here they have substance.

mist.lore: Mist blurs boundaries. In mist buildings, inside and outside merge.

smoke.lore: Smoke rises to the heavens. It is the vehicle of offerings.

ash.lore: Ash is the ghost of fire. It holds memories of destruction.

dust.lore: Dust is time made visible. Ancient places are thick with it.

fire.lore: Fire that burns without fuel. It is will made manifest.

water.lore: Water that holds form. It flows in slow motion, never freezing.

air.lore: Air given boundaries. Within, breathing comes easier.

earth.lore: Earth in its platonic form. Unshakeable foundation.

lightning.lore: Lightning frozen in the moment of strike. Raw power contained.

magma.lore: The blood of the earth itself. Dwarf forges are built over magma.

steam.lore: Steam is transformation. Water becoming air.

frost.lore: Frost that never melts. It preserves all within.

circuitry.lore: Technology sufficiently advanced is indistinguishable from magic.

data.lore: Information given form. The building knows everything within it.

plasma.lore: The fourth state of matter, tamed and shaped.

force_field.lore: Pure force, shaped by will or technology into walls.

nanomaterial.lore: Tiny machines that rebuild and adapt. The building heals itself.

pewter.lore: Pewter grants physical might. Thugs feel stronger near pure pewter.

tin.lore: Tin sharpens the senses. Tineyes see in darkest night.

zinc.lore: Zinc inflames emotions. Rioters use it to enrage or terrify.

brass.lore: Brass calms emotions. Soothers bring peace—or apathy.

chromium.lore: Chromium drains Allomantic reserves. Leechers are feared.

aluminum.lore: Aluminum is immune to Allomancy. It blocks pushes and pulls.

duralumin.lore: Duralumin burns all your metals in one explosive moment.

atium.lore: Atium is Ruin's body. Burning it grants precognition.

lerasium.lore: Lerasium is Preservation's body. Consuming it makes one Mistborn.

philosophers_stone.lore: The Stone transmutes lead to gold and grants eternal life. Few have made it.

primordial_chaos.lore: Before creation, there was Chaos. It still lurks at reality's edges.

divine_essence.lore: The stuff of gods. To touch it is to touch the infinite.

soul_stuff.lore: The raw material of souls. Breath mages can shape it into life.

ectoplasm.lore: Ectoplasm is the physical manifestation of ghostly presence.

blood.lore: Blood is life. Buildings of blood are alive in the darkest way.

tears.lore: Tears of joy and sorrow, frozen in time. They hold emotional truth.

breath.lore: Breath is life force given form. Awakeners can invest it into objects.

books.lore: Every book is a door to another mind. A library is a palace of doors.

scrolls.lore: Ancient wisdom preserved in coiled form.

parchment.lore: The medium upon which contracts are bound.

vellum.lore: The finest writing surface, fit for royal decrees and binding contracts.

papyrus.lore: The medium of pharaohs and priests.

runes.lore: Each rune is a word of power, carved into reality itself.

glyphs.lore: Glyphs guard and ward, speaking to those who know their tongue.

sigils.lore: A sigil is a cage for names and a key for doors.

grimoires.lore: Grimoires contain not just spells, but imprisoned knowledge that whispers.

echoes.lore: Echoes remember what was said, and whisper it back eternally.

whispers.lore: Whispers are secrets that refuse to die.

solidified_mana.lore: Mana crystallized by will alone. Priceless to any mage.

frozen_time.lore: Time that stopped and forgot to start again.

crystallized_thought.lore: What is thought but energy? This is thought made matter.

bottled_lightning.lore: The rage of storms, captured and waiting.

woven_moonbeams.lore: Moonbeams woven by patient hands under a full moon.

manifested_fear.lore: Fear given form. It remembers every nightmare that made it.

concentrated_joy.lore: Joy so pure it refused to fade, solidifying into permanent bliss.

distilled_sorrow.lore: Sorrow distilled to its essence. Strangely beautiful.

pure_chaos.lore: The stuff before creation, still writhing with possibility.

ordered_law.lore: The principle of order itself, made manifest.

valyrian_steel.lore: Forged in dragonfire with blood magic, its secrets lost to doom.

dragonglass.lore: Frozen fire from the dawn of days.

starmetal.lore: Forged in stellar cores and delivered by comets.

moonsilver.lore: Quicksilver blessed under a hundred full moons.

soulsteel.lore: Each blade whispers with the screams of those within.

oathgold.lore: Oaths sworn on oathgold cannot be broken without consequence.

cold_iron.lore: Cold-forged iron, anathema to the fair folk.

meteoric_iron.lore: Thunderbolt iron, a gift from the heavens.

darksteel.lore: Darksteel endures. It has no choice.

etherium.lore: Etherium flows with the essence of pure magic.

wraithbone.lore: Grown from the psychic emanations of ancient spirits.

blackite.description: Stone of the void between stars
blackite.lore: Blackstone remembers the silence before creation.

gromril.lore: The finest metal in dwarven holds, hoarded jealously.

ithilmar.lore: Light as silk, strong as steel, blessed by the sea.

hihi_irokane.lore: Metal of the gods, said to be fragments of the sun.

celestial_bronze.lore: Forged by divine smiths for heroes to wield.

stygian_iron.lore: Cooled in the River Styx, it touches more than flesh.

imperial_gold.lore: Sacred to Roman gods, deadly to their enemies.

enchanted_wood.lore: Wood that remembers being a tree, and dreams of forest.

warpstone.lore: Pure crystallized chaos. Incredibly powerful, utterly dangerous.

wyrdstone.lore: Wyrdstone fell with the comet, and nothing was the same.

promethium.lore: The lifeblood of the Imperium's war machine.

ceramite.lore: The ceramite of power armor, proof against plasma.

plasteel.lore: Standard construction material of the far future.

dragon_scale.lore: Each scale is a shield that once protected a god of fire.

dragon_bone.lore: Dragon bones remember millennia of hoarded wisdom.

phoenix_feather.lore: A phoenix feather has died and been reborn a thousand times.

unicorn_hair.lore: Freely given unicorn hair holds the purest magic.

basilisk_hide.description: Hide of the king of serpents
basilisk_hide.lore: Even in death, the basilisk's hide remembers its deadly gaze.

troll_hide.lore: Troll hide keeps regenerating. Best not to think about it.

giants_bone.lore: Pillars of bone that once held up titans.

demon_bone.lore: Demon bone whispers temptations to all who touch it.

angel_feather.lore: An angel's feather carries the weight of heaven.

lich_dust.lore: Even destroyed, a lich's power lingers in its dust.

vampire_ash.lore: Vampire ash hungers still, even in death.

werewolf_pelt.lore: The beast within never truly dies.

kraken_ink.lore: Kraken ink holds memories of the abyss.

behemoth_hide.lore: Nothing stops a behemoth. Its hide remembers.

sphinx_riddle.lore: The sphinx's riddle persists beyond its asker.

phoenix_ash.lore: From these ashes, anything might rise.

hydra_blood.lore: Cut off one head, two grow back. So too with its blood.

manticore_spine.lore: A manticore's spine delivers agony with every touch.

griffon_feather.description: Feathers of the king of beasts

fey_silver.lore: Fey silver shimmers with dreams and lies.

goblin_gold.lore: Goblin gold always returns to its makers, taking something with it.

pixie_dust.lore: Think happy thoughts, and pixie dust does the rest.

fairy_wings.lore: Fairy wings catch light that hasn't been born yet.

changeling_skin.lore: Changeling skin remembers every form it wore.

dryad_bark.lore: Dryad bark still dreams of deep roots and high branches.

nymph_tears.lore: Nymph tears hold the full depth of fey emotion.

satyr_horn.lore: Satyr horn still echoes with wild pipes.

dark_matter.description: Matter that doesn't interact with light
dark_matter.lore: Most of the universe is dark matter. It does not notice us.

neutronium.lore: A teaspoon weighs as much as a mountain.

strange_matter.lore: Strange matter converts everything it touches. Handle with care.

quantum_foam.lore: At the smallest scales, reality is foam.

probability_matter.lore: It is whatever you need it to be, until you look.

possibility_crystal.lore: Every facet shows a different future.

paradox_glass.lore: Looking through paradox glass, you see yourself not looking.

entropy.lore: Entropy always wins. This is entropy given form.

negentropy.lore: The opposite of decay. Life fighting back against the void.

raw_potential.lore: Before anything is something, it is raw potential.

crystallized_fate.lore: Some things are fated. This is what fate looks like.

world_tree_wood.lore: The world tree holds all realms in its branches.

genesis_clay.description: The clay from which life was made
genesis_clay.lore: The first clay, still warm from creation.

apocalypse_ash.description: Ash from the end of a world
apocalypse_ash.lore: This ash remembers the death of a universe.

creation_stone.description: Stone from the moment of creation
creation_stone.lore: When the universe began, there was this stone.
